name: Titanium.UI.iOS.TableViewStyle
summary: A set of constants for the style that can be used for the style property of Titanium.UI.TableView and Titanium.UI.ListView.

constants.name: GROUPED
constants.summary: A table view whose sections present distinct groups of rows. The section headers and footers do not float.

constants.name: INSET_GROUPED
constants.summary: A table view whose sections present distinct groups of rows and grouped sections are inset with rounded corners. The section headers and footers do not float.

constants.name: PLAIN
constants.summary: A plain table view. Any section headers or footers are displayed as inline separators and float when the table view is scrolled.
